body.p:
ROBERT C. WRIGHT,
Notary Public & Commissioner of Deeds.
FOR THE FOLLOWING STATES:
Wisconsin, Missouri, Kentucky, Ohio, Minnesota, Michigan, Connecticut, Iowa, New York, Indiana, N. Hampshire, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Kansas, Massachusetts, Nebraska, New Jersey, Vermont, Maine, Colorado.
WRIGHT & TYRRELL,
No. 5
METROPOLITAN BLOCK.
R. C. WRIGHT, JNO. A. TYRRELL.
Time Loans negotiated and First Class Business Paper bought and sold.
DEALERS IN REAL ESTATE.
P. O. Box, 6049.
Chicago, September 10th 1862
James W Tate Esq Asst Sec
Louisville Kentucky
Dear Sir

Your favour of 30th ult came to hand, I was just on the point of mailing a letter to you enclosing the five dollars amount of fees required by the State Statute to renew my commission, when the telegram informed us that the legal authorities had been compelled to abandon the capitol to the Confederate forces. Under these circumstances I withheld the letter and now write to ask whether I shall forward to you at Louisville. As soon as your answer is received the money will be forwarded

Illinois
Comr of Deeds
Rob. C. Wright
Chicago
Com. Issd Sept 122d 1862
